entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 4:48 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: ENE 48 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this evening then to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to flurries in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
